description: Returns table statistics on the database migration task, including table name, rows inserted, rows updated, and rows deleted. Note that the 'last updated' column the DMS console only indicates the time that DMS last updated the table statistics record for a table. It does not indicate the time of the last update to the table.

parameters.name: ReplicationTaskArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the replication task.

parameters.name: MaxRecords
parameters.description: The maximum number of records to include in the response. If more records exist than the specified MaxRecords value, a pagination token called a marker is included in the response so that the remaining results can be retrieved. Default: 100 Constraints: Minimum 20, maximum 500.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: Filters applied to table statistics. Valid filter names: schema-name | table-name | table-state A combination of filters creates an AND condition where each record matches all specified filters. (dict) --- Identifies the name and value of a filter object. This filter is used to limit the number and type of DMS objects that are returned for a particular Describe* call or similar operation. Filters are used as an optional parameter for certain API operations. The name of the filter as specified for a Describe* or similar operation. The filter value, which can specify one or more values used to narrow the returned results. (string) ---

nested_params.name: Name
nested_params.description: The name of the filter as specified for a Describe* or similar operation.

nested_params.name: Values
nested_params.description: The filter value, which can specify one or more values used to narrow the returned results.

nested_items.name: ReplicationTaskArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the replication task.

nested_items.name: TableStatistics
nested_items.description: The table statistics.

nested_items.name: SchemaName
nested_items.description: The schema name.

nested_items.name: TableName
nested_items.description: The name of the table.

nested_items.name: Inserts
nested_items.description: The number of insert actions performed on a table.

nested_items.name: Deletes
nested_items.description: The number of delete actions performed on a table.

nested_items.name: Updates
nested_items.description: The number of update actions performed on a table.

nested_items.name: Ddls
nested_items.description: The data definition language (DDL) used to build and modify the structure of your tables.

nested_items.name: AppliedInserts
nested_items.description: The number of insert actions applied on a target table.

nested_items.name: AppliedDeletes
nested_items.description: The number of delete actions applied on a target table.

nested_items.name: AppliedUpdates
nested_items.description: The number of update actions applied on a target table.

nested_items.name: AppliedDdls
nested_items.description: The number of data definition language (DDL) statements used to build and modify the structure of your tables applied on the target.

nested_items.name: FullLoadRows
nested_items.description: The number of rows added during the full load operation.

nested_items.name: FullLoadCondtnlChkFailedRows
nested_items.description: The number of rows that failed conditional checks during the full load operation (valid only for migrations where DynamoDB is the target).

nested_items.name: FullLoadErrorRows
nested_items.description: The number of rows that failed to load during the full load operation (valid only for migrations where DynamoDB is the target).

nested_items.name: FullLoadStartTime
nested_items.description: The time when the full load operation started.

nested_items.name: FullLoadEndTime
nested_items.description: The time when the full load operation completed.

nested_items.name: FullLoadReloaded
nested_items.description: A value that indicates if the table was reloaded ( true) or loaded as part of a new full load operation ( false).

nested_items.name: LastUpdateTime
nested_items.description: The last time a table was updated.

nested_items.name: TableState
nested_items.description: The state of the tables described.

nested_items.name: ValidationPendingRecords
nested_items.description: The number of records that have yet to be validated.

nested_items.name: ValidationFailedRecords
nested_items.description: The number of records that failed validation.

nested_items.name: ValidationSuspendedRecords
nested_items.description: The number of records that couldn't be validated.

nested_items.name: ValidationState
nested_items.description: The validation state of the table.
Not enabled --- Validation isn't enabled for the table in the migration task.
Pending records --- Some records in the table are waiting for validation.
Mismatched records --- Some records in the table don't match between the source and target.
Suspended records --- Some records in the table couldn't be validated.
No primary key ---The table couldn't be validated because it has no primary key.
Table error --- The table wasn't validated because it's in an error state and some data wasn't migrated.
Validated --- All rows in the table are validated. If the table is updated, the status can change from Validated.
Error --- The table couldn't be validated because of an unexpected error.
Pending validation --- The table is waiting validation.
Preparing table --- Preparing the table enabled in the migration task for validation.
Pending revalidation --- All rows in the table are pending validation after the table was updated.

nested_items.name: ValidationStateDetails
nested_items.description: Additional details about the state of validation.

nested_items.name: Marker
nested_items.description: An optional pagination token provided by a previous request. If this parameter is specified, the response includes only records beyond the marker, up to the value specified by MaxRecords.
